featured.text: Teens rated Hilfiger jeans as their number one brand in a survey in 2000.
Fashion designer Tommy Hilfiger was fully aware of the power of youth culture.
Picking up on teens' interest in computer games, Hilfiger sponsored a Nintendo competition and installed Nintendo terminals in his stores.
It can be inferred from the passage that Hilfiger __________.

definition.zh_def: 希爾費格（Hilfiger）是一個美國時尚品牌，以其經典的美式風格和休閒服裝而聞名。
definition.en_def: Hilfiger is an American fashion brand known for its classic American style and casual clothing.
definition.example: I bought a new Hilfiger shirt for the summer.
